name: Fast & Furious: Showdown
overview: Fast & Furious: Showdown is a cooperative racing video game developed by Firebrand Games. It was published by Activision for Xbox 360, Playstation 3, Wii U, Nintendo 3DS, and Microsoft Windows. The game is based on the The Fast and the Furious series, and bridges the story between the movies Fast Five and Fast & Furious 6.
